overview: Family, you can't live with them and you can't live without them. Silvia has just gotten married to the delicious Deangelo and everything seems to be going fine until her younger brother Nic shows up and throws a cock into the mix. Deangelo's secret desires come to the surface And his heart man-to-man feelings are finally fulfilled. Watch as this hot cast becomes Blended!
title: Blended Family
